actions.text: The House Committee on House Administration reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-434, by Mr. Frost.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 140.

official_title: Providing amounts from the contingent fund of the House for continuing expenses of investigations and studies by certain committees of the House from April 1, 1994, through May 31, 1994.

summary.text: Provides amounts for expenses of investigations and studies by the standing committees of the House and the Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence for April 1 through May 31, 1994.

titles.title: Providing amounts from the contingent fund of the House for continuing expenses of investigations and studies by certain committees of the House from April 1, 1994, through May 31, 1994.
